title: Phone does not reboot after pressing restart
content:
Doing a restart (power button + hit restart) does not make the phone restart. It just makes the screen black. I can feel a haptic feedback when I touch the fingerprint sensor. Waited for 10 mins but nothing happened. Need to long press the power button for the phone to boot up properly. I am currently on Android 10. Factory reset did not solve the issue.

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
